that I do not re- gard either myself or you as having been at all insulted, and as a man older than you, my ad- vice is to let the matter drop. Well then, on Friday after the review I shall expect you, Drubetsk6y. Au revoir!" exclaimed Prince An- drew, and with a bow to them both he went out. 
Only when Prince Andrew was gone did Rost6v think of what he ought to have said. And he was still more angry at having omitted to say it. He ordered his horse at once and, coldly taking leave of Bor
